titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E324)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E776-777)

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to make such Act inapplicable to the taking or jeopardy of an endangered species if such activity results from the modification of a water habitat located in or fed by a sole source aquifer designated under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
